Therefore seeing<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> we have<S>2192</S> this<S>5026</S> ministry<S>1248</S>, as<S>2531</S> we have received mercy<S>1653</S>, we faint<S>1573</S> not<S>3756</S>;
But<S>235</S> have renounced<S>550</S> the hidden things<S>2927</S> of dishonesty<S>152</S>, not<S>3361</S> walking<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> craftiness<S>3834</S>, nor<S>3366</S> handling<S>1389</S> the word<S>3056</S> of God<S>2316</S> deceitfully<S>1389</S>; but<S>235</S> by manifestation<S>5321</S> of the truth<S>225</S> commending<S>4921</S> ourselves<S>1438</S> to<S>4314</S> every<S>3956</S> man's<S>444</S> conscience<S>4893</S> in the sight<S>1799</S> of God<S>2316</S>. <sup>dishonesty: Gr. shame</sup>
But<S>1161</S> if<S>1499</S> our<S>2257</S> gospel<S>2098</S> be<S>2076</S> hid<S>2572</S>, it is<S>2076</S> hid<S>2572</S> to<S>1722</S> them that are lost<S>622</S>:
In<S>1722</S> whom<S>3739</S> the god<S>2316</S> of this<S>5127</S> world<S>165</S> hath blinded<S>5186</S> the minds<S>3540</S> of them which believe not<S>571</S>, lest<S>1519</S> <S>3361</S> the light<S>5462</S> of the glorious<S>1391</S> gospel<S>2098</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>, who<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> the image<S>1504</S> of God<S>2316</S>, should shine<S>826</S> unto them<S>846</S>.
For<S>1063</S> we preach<S>2784</S> not<S>3756</S> ourselves<S>1438</S>, but<S>235</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>; and<S>1161</S> ourselves<S>1438</S> your<S>5216</S> servants<S>1401</S> for<S>1223</S> Jesus'<S>2424</S> sake<S>1223</S>.
For<S>3754</S> God<S>2316</S>, who<S>3588</S> commanded<S>2036</S> the light<S>5457</S> to shine<S>2989</S> out of<S>1537</S> darkness<S>4655</S>,<S>3739</S> hath shined<S>2989</S> in<S>1722</S> our<S>2257</S> hearts<S>2588</S>, to<S>4314</S> give the light<S>5462</S> of the knowledge<S>1108</S> of the glory<S>1391</S> of God<S>2316</S> in<S>1722</S> the face<S>4383</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>. <sup>hath: Gr. is he who hath</sup>
But<S>1161</S> we have<S>2192</S> this<S>5126</S> treasure<S>2344</S> in<S>1722</S> earthen<S>3749</S> vessels<S>4632</S>, that<S>2443</S> the excellency<S>5236</S> of the power<S>1411</S> may be<S>5600</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3361</S> of<S>1537</S> us<S>2257</S>.
We are troubled<S>2346</S> on<S>1722</S> every side<S>3956</S>, yet<S>235</S> not<S>3756</S> distressed<S>4729</S>; we are perplexed<S>639</S>, but<S>235</S> not<S>3756</S> in despair<S>1820</S>; <sup>in despair: or, altogether without help, or, means</sup>
Persecuted<S>1377</S>, but<S>235</S> not<S>3756</S> forsaken<S>1459</S>; cast down<S>2598</S>, but<S>235</S> not<S>3756</S> destroyed<S>622</S>;
Always<S>3842</S> bearing about<S>4064</S> in<S>1722</S> the body<S>4983</S> the dying<S>3500</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, that<S>2443</S> the life<S>2222</S> also<S>2532</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> might be made manifest<S>5319</S> in<S>1722</S> our<S>2257</S> body<S>4983</S>.
For we<S>2249</S> which<S>3588</S> live<S>2198</S> are<S>3860</S> alway<S>104</S> <S>1063</S> delivered<S>3860</S> unto<S>1519</S> death<S>2288</S> for<S>1223</S> Jesus'<S>2424</S> sake<S>1223</S>, that<S>2443</S> the life<S>2222</S> also<S>2532</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> might be made manifest<S>5319</S> in<S>1722</S> our<S>2257</S> mortal<S>2349</S> flesh<S>4561</S>.
So<S>5620</S> then<S>3303</S> death<S>2288</S> worketh<S>1754</S> in<S>1722</S> us<S>2254</S>, but<S>1161</S> life<S>2222</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>.
<S>1161</S> We having<S>2192</S> the same<S>846</S> spirit<S>4151</S> of faith<S>4102</S>, according as<S>2596</S> it is written<S>1125</S>, I believed<S>4100</S>, and therefore<S>1352</S> have I spoken<S>2980</S>; we<S>2249</S> also<S>2532</S> believe<S>4100</S>, and<S>2532</S> therefore<S>1352</S> speak<S>2980</S>;
Knowing<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> he which raised up<S>1453</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> shall raise up<S>1453</S> us<S>2248</S> also<S>2532</S> by<S>1223</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall present<S>3936</S> us with<S>4862</S> you<S>5213</S>.
For<S>1063</S> all things<S>3956</S> are for<S>1223</S> your<S>5209</S> sakes<S>1223</S>, that<S>2443</S> the abundant<S>4121</S> grace<S>5485</S> might<S>4052</S> through<S>1223</S> the thanksgiving<S>2169</S> of many<S>4119</S> redound<S>4052</S> to<S>1519</S> the glory<S>1391</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
For which cause<S>1352</S> we faint<S>1573</S> not<S>3756</S>; but<S>235</S> though<S>1499</S> our<S>2257</S> outward<S>1854</S> man<S>444</S> perish<S>1311</S>, yet<S>235</S> the inward<S>2081</S> man is renewed<S>341</S> day<S>2250</S> by<S>2532</S> day<S>2250</S>.
For<S>1063</S> our<S>2257</S> light<S>1645</S> affliction<S>2347</S>, which<S>3588</S> is but for a moment<S>3910</S>, worketh<S>2716</S> for us<S>2254</S> a far<S>2596</S> <S>5236</S> more exceeding<S>1519</S> <S>5236</S> and eternal<S>166</S> weight<S>922</S> of glory<S>1391</S>;
While<S>4648</S> we<S>2257</S> look<S>4648</S> not<S>3361</S> at<S>4648</S> the things which are seen<S>991</S>, but<S>235</S> at the things which are<S>991</S> not<S>3361</S> seen<S>991</S>: for<S>1063</S> the things which are seen<S>991</S> are temporal<S>4340</S>; but<S>1161</S> the things which are<S>991</S> not<S>3361</S> seen<S>991</S> are eternal<S>166</S>.
